text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu La Tattabi`u Khutuwati Ash-Shaytani Wa Man Yattabi` Khutuwati Ash-Shaytani Fa'innahu Ya'muru Bil-Fahsha'i Wa Al-Munkari Wa Lawla FaÄ‘lu Allahi `Alaykum Wa Rahmatuhu Ma Zaka Minkum Min 'Ahadin 'Abadaan Wa Lakinna Allaha Yuzakki Man Yasha'u Wa Allahu Sami`un `Alimun
